MysteryCard.Info: Name: Unspeakably Awful Indescribable HorrorDescription: Unspeakably Awful Indescribable Horror
MysteryCard.Name: Unspeakably Awful Indescribable Horror
MysteryCard.Description: +4 against Warriors. Bad Stuff: Unspeakably awful death for anyone but a Wizard. A Wizard merely loses his powers - discard the Wizard card.
